law.catch_line: Periodic Review Of Registered Pension Plans; Exceptions; Report

text.section: the estimated cost of statutory vested benefits in respect to service in the next succeeding five-year period and the formula for computing such cost for such subsequent five-year period.
the contributions made by the employer for the preceding five-year period to fund the statutory vested benefit.

the surplus or the experience deficiency for statutory vested benefits in the pension plan after making allowances for the present value of all special payments required to be made in the future by the employer as determined by previous reports.
the special payments which will liquidate any such experience deficiency over a term not exceeding five years; and the actuarial assumptions and methods used in the determination.
